thread.title: Utah Jazz waive Bryce Cotton, Treveon Graham
thread.title_full: Utah Jazz waive Bryce Cotton, Treveon Graham

title: Utah Jazz waive Bryce Cotton, Treveon Graham
text:
Utah Jazz waive PG Bryce Cotton, F Treveon Graham, roster down to 15 Associated Press   8:01   8:01   
People: 
Utah (298) 

SALT LAKE CITY — The Utah Jazz have waived point guard Bryce Cotton and forward Traveon Graham. The team announced the moves Tuesday. 
The roster is now down to 15 players. 
Cotton first joined the Jazz on a 10-day contract in late February and signed a multi-year deal in March. He averaged 5.3 points, 1.2 rebounds and 1.0 assists in 15 games last season. 
The release of Cotton leaves the Jazz with just two pure point guards on the roster — Trey Burke and Raul Neto. 
Graham was signed as an undrafted rookie free agent out of VCU and played with the Jazz during summer league.
